result.formatted_address: Hong Kong, Metro City, 將軍澳貿業路8號新都城中心二期2樓2018號舖
result.name: Pepper Lunch

reviews.text: Yummy bbq beef rice on hot plate.  Remember to stir and mix all ingredients immediately after you get the food so as to cook the raw beef and to avoid the bottom part of food being over cooked.  Apart from beef, there is salmon to choose.  I love beef with curry and cheese!  It will be too hot to have it in summer, but it gives you energy and heat to have it in winter.
I always go to MCL to find delicious food.Delicious Beef rice.You must try Pepper Lunch when you go to MCL.
Amazing pan fried rice with all sorts of meat/veg. Cleanliness of the environment could be better though.
Quick. Healthy. Tasty. But making sure you fully cook the meet before it cools down is always a challenge
Good o' pepper lunch. This shop is as good, and crowded, as the other pepper lunch.

result.adr_address: 8 Yan King Rd, Tseung Kwan O, Hong Kong
result.formatted_address: 8 Yan King Rd, Tseung Kwan O, Hong Kong
result.name: MCP Central

reviews.text: A big mall with a huge variety of stores. It is not as crowded as other big mall. Nicely polished and there are various events/shows held in the central area
Good mall and not that busy as in more central areas
It has everything you need. Mall's toliet super clean

Plenty of choices from high end to low end products/services. 
From time to time, there is an event in the main hall for you to experience something different.
It integrates with two other phases in which enrich your shopping. There is a complete concierge counter in which can provide loss and found service, mobile phone charging service, first-aid service, and so on. 
Free Wi-Fi service is available.
On the other hand, there is a market place for grocery, and cinema to watch movies.
Very spacious h&m is present 😀

result.vicinity: 8 Yan King Road, Tseung Kwan O

result.adr_address: 香港將軍澳欣景路8號
result.name: 新都城中心二期

reviews.text: Ok👌👍
好好行嘅商場😗
Shopping😀😀😀
1)㕑房出食品慢。2)水吧講嘢多手腳慢，不斷將裝食物嘅食盤向前推，又吾跟進有些前盤欠甚麼食品或飲品。3)執枱嘅女工經常躲在清潔食盤嘅位置講是非，又賴行出外執拾枱面，每次都要四處找他們清潔枱上別人離開後的餐盤！
